channel.title: Connection Error? (Both Server & Client sided I think)
channel.description: Okay, So I'm not 100% sure if this is client or server sided. When I have my client's ip on localhost (127.0.0.1) I connect, and when on my ip it gives the error "Unexpected server response please try using a different world." YES its portforwarded correctly, because I have other servers that run correctly, I'm not sure what the problem is, but server sided it says the account has logged in, but on the client it gives that error, any suggestions?

item.title: Connection Error? (Both Server & Client sided I think)
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Okay, So I’m not 100% sure if this is client or server sided. When I have my client’s ip on localhost (127.0.0.1) I connect, and when on my ip it gives the error "Unexpected server response please try using a different world."
YES its portforwarded correctly, because I have other servers that run correctly, I’m not sure what the problem is, but server sided it says the account has logged in, but on the client it gives that error, any suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Connection Error? (Both Server & Client sided I think)
